mapper.insert: insert into person_cart(cart_time, cart_num, cart_subTotal, pro_id, user_id) values(#{cart_time},#{cart_num},#{cart_subTotal},#{pro_id},#{user_id})
mapper.select: select * from person_cart c join person_pro p on c.pro_id = p.pro_id join person_img i on p.pro_id=i.pro_id where c.user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.update: update person_cart set cart_num=#{num},cart_subTotal=#{subTotal} where pro_id=#{pro_id} and user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from person_cart where user_id=#{user_id}
